pgrid.network.router
Class RoutingRequestFactory

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.network.router.RoutingRequestFactory

public class RoutingRequestFactory
extends Object

Implementation of the abstract factory from Gamma et al. This factory provides a way to create routing request easely.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Renault John

createReplicasRoutingRequest

public static pgrid.network.router.ReplicasRequest createReplicasRoutingRequest(PGridMessage message,
                                                                                Vector exclReplicas)
Create a new replicas request. The given message will be sent to all replicas exept to the one in exclReplicas.

Parameters:
message - to be sent to replicas
exclReplicas - list of excluded replicas
Returns:
the new request object

createGenericRoutingRequest

public static pgrid.network.router.GenericRoutingRequest createGenericRoutingRequest(GenericMessage message,
                                                                                     boolean locallyStarted)
Create a new generic request.

Parameters:
message - to be sent
locallyStarted - true iff the routing process is locally started
Returns:
the new request object
